VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_spp_rek1` AS select `a`.`Id` AS `Id`,`a`.`status_valid` AS `status_valid`,`a`.`c1` AS `c1`,`a`.`c` AS `c`,`a`.`d` AS `d`,`a`.`bk` AS `bk`,`a`.`ck` AS `ck`,`a`.`dk` AS `dk`,`a`.`p` AS `p`,`a`.`q` AS `q`,`a`.`k` AS `k`,`a`.`l` AS `l`,`a`.`m` AS `m`,`a`.`n` AS `n`,`a`.`o` AS `o`,`a`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`a`.`jumlah_spm` AS `jumlah_spm`,`a`.`refid_spp` AS `refid_spp`,`a`.`jns_rek` AS `jns_rek`,`a`.`refid_nomor_spd` AS `refid_nomor_spd`,`a`.`refid_nomor_spd_det` AS `refid_nomor_spd_det`,`a`.`refid_terima` AS `refid_terima`,`a`.`refid_terima_det` AS `refid_terima_det`,`a`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`a`.`uid` AS `uid`,`a`.`uid_create` AS `uid_create`,`a`.`tgl_create` AS `tgl_create`,`a`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`b`.`nm_rekening` AS `nm_rekening`,`c`.`nama` AS `nm_kegiatan`,`d`.`nama` AS `nm_program` from (((`t_spp_rekening` `a` left join `ref_rekening` `b` on(((`a`.`k` = `b`.`k`) and (`a`.`l` = `b`.`l`) and (`a`.`m` = `b`.`m`) and (`a`.`n` = `b`.`n`) and (`a`.`o` = `b`.`o`)))) left join `ref_program` `c` on(((`a`.`bk` = `c`.`bk`) and (`a`.`ck` = `c`.`ck`) and (`a`.`dk` = `c`.`dk`) and (`a`.`p` = `c`.`p`) and (`a`.`q` = `c`.`q`)))) left join `ref_program` `d` on(((`a`.`bk` = `d`.`bk`) and (`a`.`ck` = `d`.`ck`) and (`a`.`dk` = `d`.`dk`) and (`a`.`p` = `d`.`p`))))
